restRetrieval module¶

restRetrieval.getAllAuthors(self)¶

Returns information on all the authors in the database.

Returns:An array of dictionaries containing author details for all authors
Return type:An array of Dict objects
restRetrieval.getAllDocuments(self, skip, length, sortBy, sort)¶

Finds information on all the documents listend in the database.

Parameters:
  • skip – Integer, represents the first entry to return -1. Used for pagination.
  • length – Integer, defines how many entries to return. Used for pagination.
  • sortBy – A string representing a field name to sort the results by.
  • sort – A string, “ASC” or “DESC” which signifies “ascending or descending”. This determines in which order to sorth the returned document details.
Returns:

A json array containing json objects that hold document details. The array contains length number of elements.
Return type:

A stringified json array of objects
restRetrieval.getAuthors(self, pubId)¶

Function to find all the authors associated with a publication ID

Parameters:pubId – Integer publication ID number which uniquely identifies a publication in the database.
Returns:An array of dictionaries containing all the information regarding a certain author.
Return type:An array of Dict objects
restRetrieval.getDocumentDetails(self, id)¶

Finds the details for the specified document

Parameters:id – The Publication ID integer that uniquely identifies a publication in the database.
Returns:A stringified json object containing the details for the specified publication.
Return type:A String, representing a json object
restRetrieval.getExtraDocuments(self, pubId)¶

Find information on all the extra documents associated with a publication.

Parameters:pubId – An integer which uniquely identifies a publication in the database
Returns:An array of dictionaries containing document information for all the documents associated with a publication.
Return type:An array of Dict objects.
restRetrieval.getLoginCredentials(self, username)¶

Finds the login credentials for a certain user

Parameters:username – A string that uniquely identifies a certain user account in the database.
Returns:A dictionary containing the permission level and hashed password of the specified user account.
Return type:A Dict object.
